summary: The Listening Project follows four Americans as they travel the world in order to listen to people in foreign countries and hear what they think of the United States. They visit the countries of Canada, China, India, Great Britain, Israel, Japan, Mexico, Tanzania, France, Brazil, South Africa, Afghanistan, Russia, and Palestine.
cast: Bao Phi|Bob Roeglin|Carrie Lennox|Han Shan|Daphne Banai|Pete O'Neal
keywords: american|united states|listening|love and hate relationship|yin and yang
title: The Listening Project
